name: TVCollectionViewFullScreenCell
desc: A full-screen cell used in full-screen display format.

items.name: var contentBleed: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: The amount of content that overlaps into the masked portions of the cell.

items.name: var cornerRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius to use when drawing rounded corners for the cell.

items.name: var maskAmount: CGFloat
items.desc: The factor that determines the amount of masking applied on the cell.

items.name: var maskedBackgroundView: UIView
items.desc: The background view that performs the parallax effect.

items.name: var normalizedPosition: CGFloat
items.desc: The value that determines the current cell's relative position on the screen.

items.name: func normalizedPositionDidChange()
items.desc: Notifies the cell when its normalized position changes.

items.name: func normalizedPositionWillChange(CGFloat)
items.desc: Notifies the cell when its normalized position is about to change.

items.name: func maskAmountDidChange()
items.desc: Notifies the cell when its mask amount changes.

items.name: func maskAmountWillChange(CGFloat)
items.desc: Notifies the cell when its mask amount is about to change.

items.name: var parallaxOffset: CGFloat
items.desc: The number of pixels by which to shift the background from the center when moving focus.
